overview: She is a very ordinary girl of today. Her father is an ordinary salaryman, and she has grown up without any problems. But when she turns 18, her feelings are complicated. Things have been a bit weird lately. "I don't think I'm naturally compatible anymore. The film lyrically portrays the true feelings of a lonely, pretty girl who doesn't want to grow up yet and wants to be spoiled more by her parents. The tasteful cutting captures the girl's eroticism in a refreshing way.
title: Where are You?
